org.jhotdraw.contrib
Class CustomToolBar

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JToolBar
                  org.jhotdraw.contrib.CustomToolBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class CustomToolBar
extends javax.swing.JToolBar

This ToolBar allows to use several panels with tools. It manages each panel and enables to swap between them. There can only one panel with tools be activated at a time. Currently, only two panels are supported (standard tools and edit tools).

Version:
<$CURRENT_VERSION$>
See Also:
Serialized Form
